name: Terroba Run
description:
Entry for LD32 - Working on postjam fixes!

You are Robert Terroba, a well-known corrupt politician from the Pandereta Republic. Bribe your way to the exit of the court building to escape!

Any issue, please check if is present and else, report it: https://github.com/alesegdia/LD32/labels/bug

Controls

  • cursors - movement
  • z - shoot money
  • x - open ATM

Authoring

  • Alejandro Seguí Díaz (code)
  • Juan José Bernal Rodríguez (graphics)
